label: First steps
description: "The first step of any participant is to become familiar with the project and the mechanics of tokens. Complete all the tasks in this section, understand how the project works, and get POE"

label: Let's stay in touch
description: "To follow the project, discuss it with other participants and developers, subscribe to our resources"

label: Help the development of the project
description: The introduction has been completed, now you have to provide real assistance to the project. In this section, tasks will appear that will help the project develop. Some tasks may require special qualifications, be limited in time and performers, but the payment will be appropriate. All special conditions will be indicated. Tasks will be replenished, so do not forget to check here even after completing all tasks.
